TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEnumConnections

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

span.span: Manages the definition of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於新的開發，使用。For new development, use . > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public newslot virtual instance void Clone([out] class Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IEnumConnections& ec) cil managed
Public Sub Clone (ByRef ec As IEnumConnections)

param.name: ec
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，包含新建列舉值的參考。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a reference to the newly created enumerator.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

summary.span: 建立新的列舉值，其包含與目前列舉值相同的列舉型別狀態。

span.span: Creates a new enumerator that contains the same enumeration state as the current one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Next (int cConnections, out Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CONNECTDATA[] cd, out int cFetched);
.method public newslot virtual instance void Next([in]int32 cConnections, [out] valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CONNECTDATA[]& cd, [out] int32& cFetched) cil managed
Public Sub Next (cConnections As Integer, ByRef cd As CONNECTDATA(), ByRef cFetched As Integer)
public: void Next(int cConnections, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] cli::array <Microsoft::VisualBasic::Compatibility::VB6::CONNECTDATA> ^ % cd, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % cFetched);

param.name: cConnections
param.span: 要在 cd 中傳回的 結構數目。

span.span: The number of structures to return in cd.

param.name: cd
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，包含列舉連接的參考。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a reference to the enumerated connections.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

param.name: cFetched
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含 cd 中實際列舉連接數目的參考。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a reference to the actual number of connections enumerated in cd.

summary.span: 擷取列舉型別序列中指定的項目數目。

span.span: Retrieves a specified number of items in the enumeration sequence.
